definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: We experimented with diesel engines to drive the pumps.
sentences.chinese: 我們試着用柴油機來帶動水泵。

sentences.english: Both motor and pump can work continuously.
sentences.chinese: 馬達和水泵都可以持續工作。

sentences.english: Place the new pump in position and tighten mounting bolts.
sentences.chinese: 使水泵就位，擰緊裝配螺栓。

sentences.english: For water intake pump house pressure water test shall be made on the bedrock so as to define its permeability.
sentences.chinese: 取水泵房處在基岩中進行壓水試驗，以確定其透水性。

sentences.english: Increase efficiency of pumping and aeration systems, .
sentences.chinese: 提高效率的水泵和曝氣系統，。

sentences.english: Their water pump was being rebuilt nearby.
sentences.chinese: 她家的水泵當時正在附近重建。

sentences.english: Mechanic will proceed to the fire pumps rooms to stand by and await further instruction.
sentences.chinese: 機械工應在消防水泵房內待命，等候進一步的指令。

sentences.english: They both come complete with a matching streamlet , a pump , and fountain heads .
sentences.chinese: 他們都來完成同等額小溪，一個水泵，噴泉頭。

sentences.english: The impeller and volute is the primary hydrodynamic parts, which influence the no clogging of sewage pump.
sentences.chinese: 葉輪和壓水室是影響污水泵無堵塞性的主要水力部件。

sentences.english: Pushing water past the core means pumps that are generally run by electricity.
sentences.chinese: 把水推過核心意味着需要由電力驅動的水泵。

sentences.english: But they still have feedwater pumps.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們還有供給水泵。

sentences.english: Exploring the Naica caves requires more than just industrial strength water pumps.
sentences.chinese: 進入奈卡洞穴探險需要除工業用水泵外更多的防護。

sentences.english: The high pressure pump is generally one of the most dependable and best constructed components in a high pressure cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，高壓水泵是高壓清洗機裏最可靠的部件。

sentences.english: The basic noise conditions of the water-flooding pump station are investigated in the oil—field.
sentences.chinese: 調查了油田注水泵房噪聲的基本情況。

sentences.english: The pump sucked water from the basement.
sentences.chinese: 水泵把地下室裏的水抽出來了。

sentences.english: Output may also be a function of the number of cylinders a pump possesses.
sentences.chinese: 若水泵具備氣缸的話，排泵量也是其一項功能。
